<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Harming Hands](/Feats.aspx?ID=266) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 121 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[harmful font](/Classes.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

The mordant power of your negative energy grows. When you cast [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146), you roll d10s instead of d8s.
name: Harming Hands
